programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: Can Scientists Save the World? - Panorama
programme.desc: Richard Bilton meets scientists working on solutions to climate change. Innovations include mechanical trees that absorb carbon, machines that brighten clouds and a solar reactor that makes fuel from fresh air. The scientists say their inventions have been shown to work at small scale but would need massive investment to reduce the effect of our greenhouse gas emissions. Richard investigates whether they can really make a difference.

programme.title: 100 Women
programme.desc: With a record 20 World Championship medals and 11 Olympic medals to her name, Allyson Felix is the most decorated track and field athlete in history. A dangerous pregnancy and the death of a close friend turned her into a fierce advocate for better maternal healthcare for black women. The retired athlete was behind the first nursery ever to open in an Olympic village, during the Paris 2024 games, and is now a member of the International Olympic Committee Athletes' Commission. BBC 100 Women sat down with Felix to talk about the challenges of combining motherhood and elite sport, and improving working conditions and safety for women athletes.

programme.title: The Coroner
programme.desc: A woman drops dead in the build-up to a Latin dance festival in Lighthaven.

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: UCOS reinvestigate the death of a wealthy financier when a psychic tells the dead man's daughter that she needs to resolve some unfinished business on her father's behalf.

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: When the team reinvestigate the death of university professor Dr Richard Symes, Lane finds himself going undercover in his spiritual home, The London Library.

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The detectives reopen an unsolved case involving the disappearance and murder of a 5-year-old child that happened 25 years earlier.

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: A rape is linked to two similar attacks that occurred at a chocolate factory 10 years earlier; Gerry decides to quit smoking.

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: When graffiti reappears around London, the team reinvestigate the death of graffiti artist Danny Tyler.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Gwenda Halliday sees ghostly apparitions after moving into the house of her dreams; the mystery becomes more sinister when she and Miss Marple realize that an unsolved murder was committed there.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Miss Marple is suspicious of a letter that may be the motive for a woman's suicide.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.sub-title: By the Pricking of My Thumbs
programme.desc: Tuppence is concerned by the behavior of staff and residents of a nursing home when he visits his elderly aunt.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: A snow blizzard sets in and Miss Marple is forced to take refuge at Sittaford House, isolated on a bleak Devon moor; Captain Trevelyan is found dead in his room.

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: A series of fires breaks out when a spiritualist has contact with an arsonist's ghost.

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: Matching wits with Phillipa, Jim gets involved in murder.

programme.title: Bergerac
programme.desc: Charlie needs Jim's help when a small-time crook tries to sell a share of his business.

programme.title: Boxing Day
programme.desc: A British author living in America returns home to London for Christmas to introduce his American fiancee to his eccentric British-Caribbean family. However, their relationship is put to the test as she discovers the world her fiance has left behind. Comedy, starring Aml Ameen, Aja Naomi King and Leigh-Anne Pinnock

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frederick shows up sporting a shocking new look and ignores Frasier to spend time with a girl. Eddie becomes the centre of attention, and Martin unwittingly eats a marijuana-laced brownie. Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney star

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits South Boulevard, a Korean-inspired restaurant in Little Rock, Arkansas. Owner Jermaine opened it a year before to serve a Korean menu in a tribute to his mother but is now $200,000 in debt and needs help turning things around

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tina Chiu from Mandarin Restaurants - an all-you-can-eat Chinese buffet chain - joins the lower ranks of her workforce to find out what the company could be doing to improve its position within Canada's competitive diner industry. She soon learns that serving drinks and preparing good food is easier said than done, before gathering employees at the company's headquarters to reveal her true identity

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Simon O'Brien brings the fairground to Liverpool in the form of a strength-testing machine, while Henry Cole restores a child's racing car from a sideshow

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes with Sandi Toksvig
programme.sub-title: Extraordinary Escapes at Christmas with Sandi Toksvig Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Businesswoman Deborah Meaden, actress Fay Ripley and space scientist Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock accompany Sandi Toksvig as she travels to Norway. Maggie and Sandi go in search of killer whales during a stay in an architectural gem designed for guests to enjoy the wonders of the Northern Lights from their sofa, Deborah Meaden swaps the Dragons' Den for a face-to-face meeting with a pack of wolves and it really is cold feet for Fay Ripley when in sub-zero temperatures she and Sandi venture to a mountain-top glass cabin

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking at Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie Oliver gets creative and makes a pie that embraces whatever remains from the Christmas dinner. Melting down all the leftover bits and pieces from the cheeseboard, he creates the simplest retro fondue we can make in minutes. And smashing up the leftover mince pies and Christmas pudding, the chef rolls up a treat with his 'anything goes' strudel

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Principal Skinner introduces a unique incentive to stop pupils being naughty - a ride on a submarine. It seems to do the trick, and before long Springfield Elementary's finest are competing to be the best behaved - including Bart. But has the youngster committed too many crimes against Skinner to wipe the slate clean? Meanwhile, Lisa helps Krusty with his money troubles

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A radiation leak at the nuclear plant causes snow to fall, just in time for Christmas - and when Springfield is inundated with festive holiday-makers, Marge sees a chance to make some extra cash by opening up the family home to boarders. Meanwhile, Lisa decides it's the thought that counts when buying this year's gifts - much to the annoyance of Bart

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is fed up with the price of movies, so he starts illegally downloading films and opens his own cinema in the back yard. However, when Marge turns him in, he gets busted by a government anti-piracy squad, and finds himself in trouble with a host of Hollywood bigwigs, including writer and director Judd Apatow and actors Leslie Mann, Paul Rudd, Will Arnett and Channing Tatum

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Married to the Blob Season 25, Episode 10
programme.desc: Comic Book Guy hasn't had much luck with the ladies in the past but all that changes when he takes advice from Marvel Comics head honcho Stan Lee, who gives him the courage to ask out a Japanese manga artist - and what woman wouldn't be wowed by a bouquet of flowers delivered in a Hulk hand?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Specs and the City Season 25, Episode 11
programme.desc: Mr Burns buys his employees hi-tech specs so he can spy on them. Homer is completely dazzled by his new eyewear - until they lead him to make an unexpected discovery about Marge. Meanwhile, Bart stages a rebellion against school bully Nelson

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles is forced to pretend he is Mel's husband at a party, and Frasier hires a butler who spoils everyone in the household. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Legal Tender Love and Care Season 8, Episode 6
programme.desc: The radio shrink begins to date the attractive attorney who's defending him against Donny - who was jilted at the altar by Daphne - although he suspects that she is unfairly running up his bill

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The new man in Roz's life befriends Frasier - who tries to keep the situation from her in case she starts to feel betrayed. Comedy, guest starring Gary Cole (Entourage), with Kelsey Grammer, David Hyde Pierce and Peri Gilpin

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Château de la Boutinière, Alison and Zion desperately try to renovate an ensuite bedroom, while at Château de Lalande, Stephanie bake Christmas wellington for 15

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi helps best friends Donna and Savannah find a holiday home in Roquetas de Mar on Spain's south east coast, with a budget of £70,000

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Headline update

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical version of the stage play based on Charles Dickens' classic tale about a lonely workhouse orphan who ends up on the cold streets of London, where he falls under the wing of petty crook Fagin and his gang of young backstreet thieves. Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: The Piano
programme.desc: Claudia Winkleman, Mika and Lang Lang celebrate Christmas at Battersea Power Station in central London. They are joined by some of the stars of series two who perform seasonal favourites, including Walking in the Air, O Holy Night and River. Brad Kella, the winner of this year's series, returns with a show-stopping performance, while Mika and Lang Lang duet on a Beatles classic

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: The day's main stories. With sport and weather.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four teenagers play a jungle-themed game on an old console, only to find themselves transported into the game and transformed into its heroic characters. They must embark on a death-defying journey through the game's wilderness setting to make it back to the real world, or be stuck as video game characters forever. Fantasy action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black

programme.title: Big Fat Quiz of the Year 2024
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr invites Richard Ayoade, Katherine Ryan, Rob Beckett, Judi Love, Chris McCausland and Maisie Adam to battle it out to see who knows the most about the year that's been, from what Andy Murray posted online after his retirement to the music trend that dominated the summer. Helping to ask the big questions are actor Charles Dance, the children of Mitchell Brook Primary School and a host of celebrity question-setters

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: An alien held captive in a top-secret American military base escapes and hides out in the van of two English comic-book geeks on a tour of UFO hotspots. The wisecracking extraterrestrial enlists the duo's help in getting back to his spaceship, but they are soon pursued by government agents and unwittingly become kidnappers. Sci-fi comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, with the voice of Seth Rogen

programme.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
programme.desc: While investigating the shooting of a colleague, disaster-prone police lieutenant Frank Drebin uncovers a plot to assassinate the Queen during her visit to Los Angeles. However, after he is sacked from the force by the mayor, the cop has to operate beneath the radar to get to the bottom of the conspiracy. Comedy, with Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley and Ricardo Montalban

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon and the team revamp a traditional southern food restaurant located in Richmond, Virginia. It is owned by Shane and her two daughters Chelsea and Kelyn, who have poured all their money into it - and are now in debt and trying to avoid bankruptcy

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Calgary Transit Director Doug Morgan is persuaded by the city's Mayor to shave off his trademark goatee and go undercover to see first hand how the service is performing. He is shocked to discover how hard his employees are working - cleaning vomit, dealing with busy garages, and confrontational customers - and finds a way to reward them for their hard work

programme.title: Kirstie's House of Craft
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp is inspired by nature and takes to the garden to create tiny terrariums and a hotel for bees and bugs

programme.title: Sarah Beeny's New Life in the Country
programme.desc: The family members prepare for their perfect countryside Christmas. Sarah has grand plans for a treehouse inspired by an alpine chalet, and with the main house still not complete, the woodland home will also host an early festive party for family and friends. Sarah has a ready supply of honey from her bees, which she uses to make a honey-based booze, and uses the leftover beeswax to make a candle for the treehouse. To help get in the festive mood, they also visit a herd of reindeer

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At the picturesque Château de la Fare, Janet and Philip have noticed that their hallway is looking tired, so decide to re-deck the halls before family arrive. Further north in the Charente-Maritime, there's a Christmas miracle as Bart and Sarah hold their big extravaganza. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The War of Art Season 25, Episode 16
programme.desc: When Lisa's new guinea pig destroys a painting in the family's living room, Marge and Homer pick up a replacement at the Van Houtens' yard sale. However, when they realise their purchase could be a lost, valuable masterpiece they must decide whether to keep all of the possible windfall or share it with Milhouse and his family

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: You Don't Have to Live Like a Referee Season 25, Episode 15
programme.desc: Lisa enters an essay-writing contest to sing the praises of the hero of her choice, so she chooses Homer - and when she makes an accompanying speech that grabs the attention of Brazil's football governing board, the couch potato ends up being recruited as a referee for the 2014 World Cup

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug tries to get into Carrie's good books so she will let him take a trip to Las Vegas with his friends, and Arthur visits a casino. Kevin James stars, with Leah Remini and Jerry Stiller

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie becomes a team leader at her new job, which entails working on Saturdays. A jealous Doug asks his own boss for a promotion too - but is not happy with what he is given. Meanwhile, Arthur suspects the pair of having fun without him. Kevin James stars

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Seattle shrink takes his teenage son Frederick on a camping trip with Martin in a bid to rebuild their relationship. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: After relying on the American Automobile Association one time too many, Frasier and Niles take a car maintenance class, but soon find themselves in trouble when their lack of mechanical skill prompts them to act like unruly child. Meanwhile, Martin takes over the training when Roz gets Alice a puppy

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Show Must Go Off Season 8, Episode 12
programme.desc: The brothers agree to produce a one-man show for a washed-up Shakespearean actor they idolised as children, but discover his talent has completely deserted him, and set out to save face with a spot of kidnapping. With guest stars Derek Jacobi and Patrick Macnee

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Chateau de la Boutiniere, Alison and Zion are hoping to complete an ensuite before Christmas and in the Pyrenees, Trish prepares for her first culinary workshop with a Michelin-starred chef. Jon and Carmen hold a festive medieval banquet

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: This week's competition kicks off at The Red Lion in Charing Heath, Kent, where the owners treat the other hosts to a masterclass in hospitality at nearby Leeds Castle

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition continues in Battle in East Sussex, at Dean and Becky's Glamp in Style campsite. The hosts have novelty on their side, with their unique accommodation including a converted army truck, a horsebox and a vintage bus but not everyone is keen to embrace the alternative glamping experience. In the afternoon, Becky lets loose with a saucy tale amid the local fauna and flora and at feedback time, cold water leaves the hosts feeling the heat

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Best friends Helen and Phil host the week's third visit at Tottington Manor in West Sussex. Sam and Claudia are bowled over by the decor, but some guests raise their eyebrows at the high prices. An afternoon at a local rum distillery makes Helen and Phil the toast of the town. The hosts can't stop smiling when they run through their feedback - until some comments right at the end spoil things and give Helen an axe to grind for payment day

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Sam and Claudia host the week's final visit at their self-catering Lakeview Studios in Dorset. The digs get approving eyes from Claire and Lee, but Dean and Becky's arrival is marked by a problem with their toilet. Ahead of the all-important payment day, battle lines are drawn at a tank museum

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Payment Day, Fri May 24 2024 Season 2024, Episode 30
programme.desc: Payment Day promises to be a fiery affair after two sets of B&Bers in particular participated in tit-for-tat marking throughout the week. Eventually, the week's winner is announced

programme.title: The Ten Commandments
programme.desc: Egyptian prince Moses discovers his real roots are Hebrew after being banished from the land by his jealous half-brother. He returns from exile on a quest to free his people from enslavement by the new pharaoh, and warns of terrifying consequences if the ruler fails to let his people go. Cecil B DeMille's biblical epic, starring Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Edward G Robinson and Anne Baxter

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: With sport and weather

programme.desc: A manager for an American courier service has to fend for himself when a plane crash leaves him stranded alone on a desert island. Adventure drama, starring Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Nick Searcy, Lari White and Chris Noth

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

Slapstick comedy sequel, starring Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, George Kennedy, Richard Griffiths and OJ Simpson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: John Gunn, president of fashion company Mexx Canada, is new to the organisation and determined to shake things up. programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The shrink turns interior designer to help a local home-building scheme, but his plans prove too grand for the new residents, and he is soon shown the door. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.desc: In this homage to the film Sliding Doors, two possible versions of the shrink's Valentine's Day unfold - one in which a waitress captures his heart and one where he spends a lonely night at home. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles puts Daphne on a diet, unaware she has secret stashes of food hidden all over the place. Roz tries a new perfume guaranteed to have a devastating effect on men, while Frasier sets out to save station manager Kenny's marriage - only to end up dating his wife

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles attends a Seattle SuperSonics basketball game with Frasier, where he is plucked out of the crowd at random and offered a big cash prize to sink a half-court shot. David Hyde Pierce stars

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz asks Frasier to narrate her documentary on the history of space travel - but he makes such a hash of it she ends up getting rid of him and recruiting former astronaut John Glenn instead. Meanwhile, Niles tries to relive his childhood by entering a kite-flying competition

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: It Takes Two to Tangle Season 8, Episode 17

programme.desc: The first of three programmes looking back at the 2022 edition of the culinary competition hosted by Harry Hill, with chef Ravneet Gill joining Paul Hollywood and Liam Charles to judge proceedings. programme.desc: The competition begins with Nick and Tim at Home Farm B&B in Milton Keynes, where secrets get revealed during a visit to the home of Second World War code breakers

programme.desc: The week's second visit takes the B&Bers to Cricklade in Wiltshire, where Iain and Tayla host at The Vale Hotel. Their breakfast-free, no frills ethos has some of the guests worried, but it's the proximity to a main road that causes the most concern for one pair. Over drinks, the gang try an intimacy exercise that leaves Tayla in an awkward position, before the noisy neighbourhood is cause for much consternation in the feedback

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Francesca and Maurizio host the week's third visit at Cottage Lodge Hotel in Brockenhurst in The New Forest. The pair have a background in high-end hotels, and their green approach to hospitality leaves some of the B&Bers impressed but a tree hugging trip divides the group in the afternoon. The hosts' passion for local produce takes pride of place at breakfast but they're left with a sour taste over their facilities scores

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Husband-and-wife team Karl and Rohini host the week's final visit, at Beach Sun Retreat in Dymchurch, Kent. Drinks on the pair's indoor beach brightens the mood, but some are left feeling less enlightened by the veggie breakfast the next morning

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Alpine Train at Christmas
programme.desc: A festive ride on the illustrious Bernina Express, one of the most picturesque trains in the world, beginning in Chur, the oldest town in Switzerland, and travelling through the Alpine landscape to the town of Tirano in Italy. Along the way, the train visits the Morteratsch Glacier, the Landwasser Viaduct and Lago Bianco, meeting people who live and work in the area including an artisan cheese-maker, a creator of traditional Christmas toys and a multi-generational musical farming family. programme.title: World's Strongest Man 2024
programme.desc: Action from the second heat, held at Myrtle Beach in South Carolina, where Mitchell Hooper of Canada got his defence of the title under way, with British hope Gavin Bilton also among those taking on six gruelling disciplines. Presented by James Richardson, Eddie Hall, and Michelle Ackerley, with Colin Bryce and Danny Wallace providing the commentary

programme.title: Monsters of the Deep: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: The first of two programmes exploring the world of deep-sea killers, revealing mysterious creatures with the use of cutting-edge CGI, including the anglerfish, which lures prey with its glowing spine. Giant prehistoric fish the dunkleosteus is brought back to life with a mechanical bite force test, while adventurer Steve Backshall uncovers the secrets of the stoplight loose-jaw, while biologist Jennifer Hoyal Cuthill reveals the terrifying thalassotitan, an evolved predator that moved from land to sea over millions of years

programme.title: The Serial Killer's Wife
programme.desc: Beth turns to her husband's best friend Adam for help as she grapples with a new revelation, while the police connect Tom to more murder victims and news of the Fairchilds' unconventional sexual history quickly spreads around town. Beth and Adam develop a plan, but a chase ensues which ends with a car crashing into the sea

programme.title: When Parties Go Horribly Wrong
programme.desc: A look at nightmare moments from disastrous gatherings, including a garden party that quickly went downhill when a brawl kicked off in front of horrified guests, and parents-to-be left lost for words when their gender reveal failed spectacularly as the wrong colour was illuminated on the side of a prominent landmark. Other highlights include the dad who thought his pole dancing skills would be a great way to get noticed at a swanky marquee party and a Christmas do that took a turn for the worse when a Dirty Dancing lift ended with a partygoer in A&E

programme.title: Million Pound Motorhomes
programme.desc: Ricky Tomlinson takes a trip down memory lane in north Wales as he goes in search of his beloved old motorhome, and there is a look at a $2.5million vehicle in America. Multimillionaire businessman Charlie goes shopping for his first motorhome, and Paralympic equestrian Natasha Baker competes in the qualifiers for Tokyo

programme.title: World's Strongest Man 2024
programme.desc: Action from the opening heat, held at Myrtle Beach in South Carolina, where British hope Luke Stoltman was among those in action, hoping to reach his fifth successive final. programme.title: The World's Greatest Bridges
programme.desc: Sydney Harbour Bridge, the world's tallest and widest steel arched bridge, was completed in 1932, more than a century after its initial proposal. Connecting the northern suburbs with the city centre, its completion brought together a city divided not just by water but by cultural differences. As Rob Bell reveals, John Bradfield was so determined to build the bridge that he dedicated more than 20 years of his life to its construction, travelling the world to employ the very best builders and engineers, who utilised the very latest technologies and techniques of their time

programme.desc: Skeldale House prepares for Christmas and Jimmy's first birthday, but everyone is rocked by news that Edward's ship HMS Repulse has been sunk. Mrs Hall has to endure an agonising wait, but when a young boy arrives at the surgery with an abandoned fox cub, she can't help feeling a connection with the animal. Meanwhile, Tristan is given an important Royal Army Veterinary Corps mission to source the best Yorkshire pigeons for a new breeding programme, for which Siegfried sends him to Enoch Sykes, a cantankerous pigeon fancier whose birds are having digestive problems. Festive episode of the drama, starring Samuel West

programme.desc: The story of Frank Abagnale Jr, who found notoriety as a teenager conning and charming his way across America. programme.desc: Part two of two. A look at the world of the deep-sea giants that live at depths over 1,000 metres, including the giant squid and the massive extinct shark species megalodon. Experts reveal rare behaviours and the incredible size of these creatures, with Steve Backshall meeting Dr Nathan Robinson to uncover the giant squid's mysteries. Also featured is the cookiecutter shark, an abyssal giant that grow 700 times larger than its shallow-water equivalents, as well as new discoveries like Ichthyotitan

programme.title: The Long Good Friday
programme.desc: A ruthless London crime lord tries to extend his dockland empire by exploring business opportunities in America. When his organisation is the target of a series of bombings, he discovers a mysterious syndicate is trying to muscle in on his territory, and resorts to increasingly brutal methods to expose the culprits. Gritty thriller, starring Bob Hoskins, Helen Mirren, Dave King and Bryan Marshall, with Pierce Brosnan and Casualty's Derek Thompson in supporting roles

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: A heartless TV executive is cruel to his employees and sees the festive season as nothing more than an opportunity to make money. However, on Christmas Eve, three ghosts arrive in the night and challenge him to change his cynical ways by showing him his past, present and future. Comedy based on Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, starring Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, David Johansen and Carol Kane

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A wealthy woman's privileged existence is shattered when she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend. Seeking solace, she turns to her estranged sister, who lives in a London council estate, and finds a new lease of life in joining her community dance class. Comedy, starring Imelda Staunton, Celia Imrie, Timothy Spall and Joanna Lumley

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: The seemingly invincible hero returns, this time with a $14million bounty on his head which rises each hour, and every underworld figure around the world desperate to cash in. However, John Wick does receive support from Sofia, a fellow dog lover, assassin and manager of Casablanca's Continental Hotel. Director Chad Stahelski's action thriller sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Halle Berry and Ian McShane

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An underworld courier lives by a simple code - to never ask what he is transporting. However, when he discovers his latest cargo is alive, his conscience gets the better of him and he faces a dangerous game of cat and mouse with his unknown but powerful employers. Action adventure, starring Jason Statham, Shu Qi, Matt Schulze and Francois Berleand

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A 17th-century sorcerer escapes execution by travelling forward in time to the 1980s, where he searches for a mystical book that will allow him to bring about the end of the world. However, a heroic witch hunter has pursued him through time intent on bringing his evil schemes to an end. Fantasy adventure, starring Julian Sands, Richard E Grant, Lori Singer and Kevin O'Brien

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: A workaholic businessman always puts his job before his family until he receives an unexpected inheritance from his explorer father - six penguins. He abandons his plan to offload the birds to a zoo when he finds his kids love them, and sets about turning his New York apartment into a suitable habitat. Family comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Carla Gugino and Angela Lansbury

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: In 1987, lonely Californian teenager Charlie Watson is traumatised by the death of her father and resentful of her mother Sally's relationship with new boyfriend Ronald. For her 18th-birthday she's given a yellow Volkswagen Beetle, which turns out to be the battle-scarred Autobot Bumblebee. Transformers prequel, starring Hailee Steinfeld, John Cena and Jorge Lendeborg Jr

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCall divides his time between cab driving and looking after a young man who is mixing with a bad crowd. When a CIA friend is murdered, the former black ops agent sets out to avenge her death, and winds up fighting for survival in his hurricane-battered home town. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal and Ashton Sanders

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah

programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: A recently widowed traveller is kidnapped by a cold-blooded killer, only to escape into the wilderness, where she is forced to battle against the elements as her pursuer closes in on her. Horror, starring Jules Willcox, Marc Menchaca and Anthony Heald

programme.title: Spies in Disguise
programme.desc: A secret agent branded a traitor tries to clear his name, with the aid of a socially awkward inventor he had fired for only developing non-lethal gadgets. The scientist's latest invention gets out of control and transforms the spy into a pigeon - giving him the perfect disguise to prove his innocence. Animated adventure, with the voices of Will Smith, Tom Holland and Karen Gillan

programme.title: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: The heroic sailor pits his wits against an evil magician who has shrunk a princess to the size of a doll - but to break the spell, Sinbad must journey to a mysterious island inhabited by hideous monsters and find a magic lamp. Fantasy adventure, starring Kerwin Mathews, Kathryn Grant and Torin Thatcher, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A directionless loser tries to prove himself to the woman he loves by volunteering for a travel writing assignment. He is sent to the Bermuda Triangle, where he ends up stranded on an island populated by miniature people to whom he is a giant. Fantasy comedy, starring Jack Black, Emily Blunt, Jason Segel and Billy Connolly

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: Teenager Alex Rider discovers his late uncle was a secret agent, and is assigned the task of completing his last mission - uncovering a criminal mastermind's plan to cause mayhem with a new kind of super-computer. Adventure based on Anthony Horowitz's novel, starring Alex Pettyfer, Bill Nighy, Mickey Rourke, Alicia Silverstone and Stephen Fry

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: Decorated veteran Will Sharp, desperate for money to cover his wife's medical bills, asks for help from the one person he knows he shouldn't - his adoptive brother Danny, a charismatic career criminal. Danny instead offers him a score - the biggest bank heist in Los Angeles history. With his wife's survival on the line, Will can't say no, but when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate brothers hijack an ambulance with a wounded cop and an EMT onboard. Crime drama, directed by Michael Bay and starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and Eiza González

programme.title: The Last Stand
programme.desc: Disgraced narcotics cop Ray Owens retires into a quiet life as sheriff of a small town on the Mexican border. He gets the chance to prove his worth as a law enforcer when a drug lord escapes from prison and tries to flee the US - with his escape route taking him through Ray's jurisdiction. Action thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Johnny Knoxville and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois becomes a martial arts expert and puts her new-found skills to use by chasing away tourists watching the leaves fall in Quahog. Unfortunately her zeal for combat soon infects the entire Griffin household, leading to an all-out family brawl

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: How the Griffin Stole Christmas Season 15, Episode 9
programme.desc: Peter is asked to fill in for a mall Santa, but soon gets drunk on power when he realises that he can get away with anything while dressed as Father Christmas. Meanwhile, Stewie and Brian crash holiday office parties for free food, drama and women

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: After a series of boring personas, Roger goes to great lengths to prove to Francine he still has an edge

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.sub-title: Dreaming of a White Porsche Christmas Season 10, Episode 6
programme.desc: Stan makes a wish upon his Christmas tree angel to become single once again - which then comes true. Meanwhile, Principal Lewis's dreams come true when he takes on Stan's family

programme.title: Celebrity Karaoke Club
programme.desc: The singing competition returns, with Chrishell Stause, Bobby Norris, Callum Izzard, Karim Zeroual, Donna Preston and Laura Anderson taking part this time. Reigning champion AJ Odudu pays a visit and one of them gets to live their childhood fantasy and perform a duet with Tina Barrett and Bradley McIntosh of S Club 7

programme.title: Count Abdulla
programme.desc: The first episode of a comedy series about twenty-something British-Pakistani Muslim doctor Abdulla Khan. Something sinister is going on around the edges of Hounslow's Muslim community, but Abdulla is torn between the Halloween party of the year hosted by his crush Amrita and the Eid gathering that his dear mother Bushra expects him to attend. When Abdulla then has a chance encounter with a shadowy figure at the bus stop on his way home, a disappointing night ends with a supernatural twist...

programme.title: Count Abdulla
programme.desc: Comedy series about twenty-something British-Pakistani Muslim doctor Abdulla Khan. Something's not right as Abdulla feels out of it and has developed inexplicable allergies and insatiable cravings at work... so what's happening to him? Meanwhile, his mysterious bus stop assailant Kathy is looking for him as she's worried that she may have passed something on that could spread around the community, and an encounter with a stray piece of garlic naan makes what ails our junior doctor far clearer...

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: Matt Edmondson narrates a selection of unusual records, including the world's smallest horse, the world's fastest human crab, and the highest note ever sung

programme.title: Totally Bonkers Guinness World Records
programme.desc: A selection of some of the most incredible and peculiar record-breaking attempts, including the tallest human pyramid and the longest ramp jump with a caravan. Matt Edmondson narrates

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Knight Time Terror
programme.desc: When an old, haunted house known as Grimsley Mansion opens to the public, the gang investigates to solve the mystery behind a legendary 'Black Knight'. Comedy, with the Scooby gang

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.sub-title: Nip and Duck / Telephone Pole Gag 2: Circular Fan / Asphalt and Battery Season 2, Episode 7
programme.desc: Daffy Duck learns that he's a terrible tailor, and Sylvester becomes a fan of great food

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series. George P. Mandrake hires The Looney Builders to build a T. Rex fossil, but Tweety's fear of the big dinosaur affects his ability to get the job done.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Buff in a China Shop Season 1, Episode 20
programme.desc: Animated series. Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against the Riddler.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.sub-title: A Round of Golf Season 2, Episode 40
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fancies a game of golf, so he creates his own golf course inside his flat - he then invites Irma to join him for a round

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean turns superhero in an attempt to outwit a cunning cat burglar

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.sub-title: The Hodag of Horror Season 2, Episode 5
programme.desc: The gang goes in search of the mythical Hodag beast but stumbles across something much more valuable

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes to Salem, Massachusetts, for the historical festival, only to discover history repeating itself as a demon has been set loose on the town, supposedly summoned by a witch as revenge for the infamous 17th-century Salem witch trials

programme.title: What's New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Block-Long Hong Kong Terror Season 3, Episode 10
programme.desc: The gang has to deal with a fake festive dragon that comes to life and causes mayhem in Hong Kong

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: What a Night for a Dark Knight! Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang come to Gotham City to visit Daphne's 'Uncle' - Alfred Pennyworth - and stumble into a dangerous mystery

programme.title: The Smurfs: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Short festive animation in which three ghosts try to teach Grouchy Smurf the meaning of Christmas

programme.title: Alan Carr's Epic Gameshow
programme.sub-title: The Price Is Right Season 1, Episode 7
programme.desc: The comedian revives another classic game show with a special festive edition of The Price Is Right. Eight members of the studio audience will be invited to 'Come on Down' and spin the famous wheel, guess the value of assorted items, and compete in the Epic Showcase for the chance to win a mountain of Christmas prizes

programme.title: Celebrity Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts a festive edition of the game show, with Perri Kiely, Anne Hegerty and Rob Brydon all trying to say what they see, as they guess well-known phrases for the chance to win a £50,000 jackpot for their chosen charity

programme.title: The Masked Singer
programme.desc: Four celebrities compete undercover in elaborate costumes, keeping their true identities hidden. Dawn French, Jennifer Saunders, Jonathan Ross and Mo Gilligan try to guess the identities of Christmas Cracker, Star, Turkey Crown and Nutcracker. Joel Dommett hosts

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into a haunted house where his daughter befriends the amiable ghost of a young boy - but things start to go awry when three smelly spooks and two dastardly crooks try to chase the new residents away. Family comedy, starring Christina Ricci, Bill Pullman, Eric Idle, Cathy Moriarty and featuring the voice of Malachi Pearson

programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones are called away from a team-building exercise to investigate a fatal explosion at a haulage yard in Calham Cross. The property is owned by Territorial Army commanding officer Matt Parkes, the father of a businessman whose ruthlessness in the boardroom is matched only by his behaviour toward women. To complicate matters, the village is also home to a peace protester and a grieving mother - and Barnaby has to decide if any of these locals is capable of arson and murder. John Nettles and Jason Hughes star, with Tim Pigott-Smith, Joseph Millson, Niamh Cusack, Judy Parfitt and Nick Fletcher

programme.title: Goodbye Mr Chips
programme.desc: Martin Clunes stars as an earnest Latin master working at the Brookfield School of the 1880s, where he meets and marries his true love Kathie and finds himself touched by politics, grief and the utter devastation of World War One. Charting more than 50 years of one man's extraordinary life, the story ends in the 1930s, as a wise, elderly and much-loved Mr Chipping lives out his last days in retirement. Frank Delaney's adaptation of James Hilton's timeless classic, which has never been out of print since first appearing as a magazine serialisation in 1934, and for which Robert Donat whipped an Oscar from under the nose of Gone with the Wind's Clark Gable in the 1939 film production. Also starring Victoria Hamilton, Conleth Hill and Patrick Malahide

programme.title: Downton Abbey

John Nettles and John Hopkins star

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Mr Carson and Mrs Hughes' wedding is fast approaching, but a misunderstanding threatens to derail the occasion, and when the big day arrives it also brings a few unexpected guests. Meanwhile, Edith reconnects with an old acquaintance, who comes to her aid in her hour of need, and over at the Dower House, Spratt has something to hide, meaning Denker is hot on his trail. Daisy jumps to conclusions about one of the countess's plots, and tensions mount over the hospital takeover, prompting Isobel to offend a friend. Period drama, starring Jim Carter, Phyllis Logan, Elizabeth McGovern and Laura Carmichael

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Tom and Sybbie return to Downton, but the peace is disrupted by an unexpected visit from an old friend. Baxter is faced with a dilemma after an encounter with Sergeant Willis, while Thomas struggles to fill Carson's shoes. Anna goes to London with Mary to deal with a crisis, while her secrets seem likely to be exposed. Daisy is not happy with Cora, and Mary has an admirer

programme.title: Lewis
programme.sub-title: Entry Wounds - Part One Season 8, Episode 1
programme.desc: The last run of the detective drama ended with Lewis (Kevin Whately) starting a new life away from the force, but it seems that peace and quiet doesn't suit him - which is just as well, as newly promoted DI Hathaway (Laurence Fox) is struggling to find a sidekick, and within just four weeks is already on to his second sergeant, DS Lizzie Maddox (Angela Griffin). So, Chief Superintendent Innocent (Rebecca Front) decides to reunite the former partners to look into the murder of a neurosurgeon, a case with potential links to the worlds of animal rights and blood sports. In the first of this two-part story, suspicion falls on glamorous widow Erica (Kara Tointon), but it turns out there are plenty of other people in the victim's inner circle who were driven by fear and loathing

programme.title: Man About the House
programme.sub-title: Love and Let Love Season 5, Episode 4
programme.desc: The flatmates come up with a new rule to give their romantic pursuits a chance of privacy - but it means giving 24 hours' notice. Comedy, starring Richard O'Sullivan

programme.title: Bless This House
programme.desc: Mike and Sally plan a holiday, but things run far from smoothly when Sid gets involved with the financial planning. Comedy, starring Sid James and Diana Coupland

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: When their house is subjected to a compulsory purchase order, the Ropers swap urban surroundings for suburbia, where Mildred dreams of climbing the social ladder. George, on the other hand, wants to maintain as low a profile as possible. First episode of the sitcom, starring Yootha Joyce and Brian Murphy

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: The Ropers meet their new neighbours' dog, and George discusses politics with his local MP. Comedy, starring Yootha Joyce and Brian Murphy

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Gruff detective Jack Frost's plans for a quiet weekend are disrupted by the gruesome discovery of an unidentified body floating in the river. However, soon after he has begun the investigation, he is forced to apply his deductive skills to a separate case involving an act of violence during a football match which left a player in a coma. Crime drama, starring David Jason, Larry Lamb, Bruce Alexander, Lindy Whiteford and Berwick Kaler

programme.title: Bless This House
programme.sub-title: The First 25 Years Are the Worst Season 4, Episode 6
programme.desc: Sid forgets an important party - unfortunately the occasion is his silver wedding anniversary. Sid James stars

programme.title: Bless This House
programme.desc: Middle-aged father Sid Abbott's dream of building an illegal whisky still in the shed is continually frustrated by the antics of his son and daughter. However, he has a bigger problem in store when new neighbours move in next door and conflict instantly erupts. Comedy, based on the sitcom, starring Sid James, Diana Coupland and Sally Geeson

programme.title: Carry On Up the Khyber
programme.desc: British forces in colonial India find themselves in deep trouble when a manic local ruler discovers the soldiers' fearsome reputation is thoroughly undeserved - prompting open rebellion. Comedy, starring Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Roy Castle, Joan Sims, Bernard Bresslaw and Terry Scott

programme.title: Carry On Dick
programme.desc: Two officers of the law dedicated to catching a cheeky highwayman enlist the help of a vicar, unaware the pious pastor and his buxom housemaid are not as innocent as they seem to be. Comedy, starring Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Jack Douglas, Barbara Windsor, Bernard Bresslaw, Joan Sims and Hattie Jacques

programme.title: Carry On Doctor
programme.desc: A popular doctor is sacked after a misunderstanding ruins his reputation, prompting the furious patients to stage a revolt against the luckless medic's strait-laced superiors. Meanwhile, the hospital head has his own problems after becoming the unlikely romantic target of a strict matron. Comedy, with Frankie Howerd, Jim Dale, Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey and Hattie Jacques

programme.title: Carry On Camping
programme.desc: Two men lure their unsuspecting girlfriends to a nudist camp, with hopes of having a wild old time - but the joke is on the men when it turns out they have ended up at a traditional family campsite. Bawdy comedy, starring Sid James, Bernard Bresslaw, Kenneth Williams, Joan Sims and Barbara Windsor

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Neville Chamberlain visits Downton for dinner, and is drawn into Violet's plan to save the hospital, with distressing consequences for everyone. Andy finds an unexpected confidante while helping Mr Mason move into Yew Tree Farm, Mary is uncertain if she has met her match, Edith meets Bertie Pelham in London, and Spratt comes to Denker's aid. Mrs Hughes struggles to keep Carson happy, while Mary thinks secrets are being kept from her

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The house is made open to the public for a day to raise money for the hospital, an act that divides opinions among the family and the servants. Tensions between Violet and Cora come to a head as a decision is made about the hospital takeover, Mr Dawes has a proposition for Molesley, and Baxter is thrown into turmoil by an unexpected letter. Carson is not happy with Thomas, but all is not as it appears, while Mary and Edith hope to overcome their past and find new happiness with the men in their lives

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Aunt Joan reveals she has a rare bird nesting on her land but wants to keep it a secret to deter prospective egg thieves. Sure enough, her tactless nephew opens his mouth to the local baker, who spies an opportunity to save his ailing business by making it a new attraction. Before long the peaceful community of Portwenn is over-run by twitchers eager to catch a sight of the bird, and Dr Ellingham finds himself in the locals' bad books yet again. Martin Clunes stars in this Christmas special of the comedy drama, originally shown in 2006

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.sub-title: The Maid in Splendour Season 7, Episode 5
programme.desc: A barman from rural inn the Maid in Splendour is shot dead as he walks near a ruined cottage in woodlands - and Barnaby's investigation reveals a clash between charming landlord Michael Bannerman, the unofficial squire of Midsomer Worthy, and his abrasive son Stephen, who now runs the pub. John Nettles and John Hopkins star, with guest appearances by William Gaunt, Alan Cox, Dave Hill and Frances Tomelty

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Neville Chamberlain visits Downton for dinner, and is drawn into Violet's plan to save the hospital, with distressing consequences for everyone. programme.title: Lewis
programme.sub-title: The Lions of Nemea Season 8, Episode 1
programme.desc: Hathaway appears to have got over his fear of Lewis treading over his newly promoted toes. Their opposites have attracted in the past, and there seems no reason to suspect that they won't now the younger man has got used to the idea of his former mentor coming out of retirement to lend him a hand. Even DS Maddox isn't getting on Hathaway's nerves quite as much, so this rejuvenated trio sets out to discover who murdered American classics student Rose Anderson, whose body has been hauled from the canal with neck and abdomen wounds. Nevertheless, a few red herrings threaten to get in their way of landing the killer. Kevin Whately, Laurence Fox and Angela Griffin star

programme.title: Bugsy Malone
programme.desc: Alan Parker's slapstick musical comedy, featuring a cast composed entirely of children and following a war between rival gangsters in 1920s New York - fought with custard pies and cream-firing Tommy guns. When a slick mobster acquires devastating new weapons, his arch rival enlists the aid of a small-time chancer to steal them. Starring Scott Baio, Florrie Dugger and John Cassisi, with Jodie Foster in an early appearance

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Dour DI Jack Frost suspects a man he arrested years before for a series of bizarre assaults on children could have returned to the area and recommenced his unsavoury activities. He tracks down the culprit, who swears he has turned over a new leaf, and decides not to charge him - a decision that shocks fellow sleuth DS Maud, whose misgivings are later justified in tragic fashion. Starring David Jason, Peter Gunn, Susannah Doyle, Bruce Alexander, John Lyons and Gwyneth Powell

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Jack learns he is tipped for promotion with the uniform branch and even more flattered to discover he has a secret admirer, but before he has time to bask in this rare moment of glory a child murder claims his attention. Linking the disappearance of a 10-year-old boy to a mysterious hit-and-run killing, he is soon mired in a complex investigation and fuming about a bureaucratic blunder that leaves a known paedophile walking free on his patch. David Jason stars

programme.title: George and Mildred: The Movie
programme.desc: The mismatched suburban couple go on a weekend holiday in London to celebrate their wedding anniversary, only for gangsters to mistake George for a hired killer. Spin-off from the sitcom, starring Yootha Joyce, Brian Murphy and Stratford Johns

programme.title: Carry On Up the Jungle
programme.desc: A Victorian explorer recalls how he was recruited by an aristocrat to find her missing son in the African jungle. Teaming up with a fearless hunter, he hoped to find a rare bird on his journey - but instead fell into the clutches of an all-female tribe. Comedy, starring Sid James, Frankie Howerd, Joan Sims, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey and Terry Scott

programme.title: Carry On Again Doctor
programme.desc: A disgraced surgeon sets up a clinic in the hope of promoting a supposedly miraculous slimming potion made from secret ingredients discovered on a remote tropical island. Comedy, starring Sid James, Kenneth Williams, Jim Dale, Barbara Windsor, Charles Hawtrey, Hattie Jacques, Pat Coombs and Joan Sims

programme.title: Carry On Follow That Camel
programme.desc: A disgraced English gentleman joins the Foreign Legion to restore his honour, and proves himself an unlikely hero. Meanwhile, his naive lost love learns he was innocent, and heads to the desert to bring him home. Comedy, starring Phil Silvers, Jim Dale, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Peter Butterworth, Bernard Bresslaw and Joan Sims

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: The Crawleys watch Henry compete in a motor racing event, an occasion that leaves Mary reeling. Violet hatches a plan which surprises the family and delights Miss Denker, and learns more about Amelia's intentions in befriending Isobel. Molesley and Daisy rise to the challenges of examination day, Andy's secret is brought to light, Thomas feels isolated, and Mrs Patmore and Mrs Hughes teach Carson a lesson

programme.title: Downton Abbey
programme.desc: Bertie's circumstances change suddenly, leaving Edith uncertain whether to risk telling him the truth or keep her past a secret at all costs. Mary wonders if she can ever make peace with her sister as hostilities escalate, Spratt shows some hidden talents and Molesley's first day as a teacher does not go according to plan. Mrs Patmore's bed and breakfast attracts unwanted attention, leaving her in need of the Crawleys' help

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Vera Stanhope is called to a quiet country lane where a young man has been found dead following a collision with a car, but it becomes clear on closer inspection it was not an accident and is more complicated than just a hit-and-run. Vera discovers the victim is a popular market trader and heads down to his pitch to start to put together an idea of who he was and why anyone would want him dead. Crime drama, starring Brenda Blethyn

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Midsomer Parva hosts the revival of a traditional pagan festival, but tragedy strikes when curate Alex Dakin is burned alive inside a straw effigy of a woman. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sanaa Lathan, Raoul Bova and Lance Henriksen

programme.sub-title: 1989 Liverpool v Arsenal Title Decider - ITV Football Classic
programme.desc: Elton Welsby presents extended highlights of the memorable match at Anfield, which saw Arsenal needing to win by at least two goals to pip their opponents to the title. With analysis from Bobby Robson, reports by Jim Rosenthal and commentary from Brian Moore and David Pleat

programme.title: Minder
programme.sub-title: Minder on the Orient Express Season 6, Episode 7
programme.desc: Terry helps the daughter of a deceased villain and receives tickets for the Orient Express as a thank you, while Chisholm lands a job with Interpol. Feature-length Christmas special from 1985

programme.title: The Grand Fishing Adventure
programme.desc: Ali Hamidi and Bobby Zamora's bucket list fishing tour of Britain begins in Shropshire. Their first mission is to catch a specimen crucian of over 2lbs. Next, they head to a top syndicate water called The Avenue, where the carp reach an incredible 60lbs. They set themselves the mission of both beating their current UK carp PBs. Ali also calls in a favour from Two Michelin-Star chef and carp angler Daniel Clifford

programme.title: The Grand Fishing Adventure
programme.desc: The second leg of the UK tour sees Ali and Bobby attempt to catch a monster shark over 400lbs from just off the north Devon coast. The boys actually hook the biggest shark they've ever seen and have to tag team on the rod to try and get the sea beast to the boat. They then venture to Norfolk in pursuit of Britain's biggest freshwater predator - the wels catfish. The duo's mission is to catch a giant over 50lbs. Chef Daniel Clifford also pays the lads another visit for a bank side cook-a-long.

programme.title: The Grand Fishing Adventure
programme.desc: Ali and Bobby head to Nottinghamshire to fish the River Trent for big barbel and have just 24 hours to succeed - Bobby has never even caught a barbel before, so can he break his duck? Ali then blindfolds Bob and drives him to a top-secret lake at a classified location - here they hope to catch some of the mysterious big carp that reside there. Two Michelin-starred chef Daniel is also smuggled into the venue, and he sets the lads a cooking competition to hopefully fuel them for further catches

programme.title: The Grand Fishing Adventure
programme.desc: Ali and Bobby head off on the final leg of their British Isles tour to a lake in Essex, where they fly fish for trout. The main event follows at one of Britain's premier carp waters, Grenville in Cambridgeshire. The mission here is for Bobby to beat his UK carp PB - he must put in a man of the match performance to succeed. Daniel Clifford pays the boys a visit and sets his last bankside cooking challenge

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: A Union cavalry officer is ordered to demolish a railway junction in the middle of Confederate territory, but finds his authority constantly challenged by a military surgeon assigned to accompany him. John Ford's Western, based on an actual Civil War incident, starring John Wayne, William Holden, Constance Towers, Hoot Gibson and Anna Lee.

Western, starring Robert Redford, Stefan Gierasch and Will Geer

programme.title: PopMaster TV
programme.desc: Ken Bruce hosts a festive edition of the quiz as DJs Bob Harris, Katie Thistleton, OJ Borg, Jenny Powell and Rickie Haywood-Williams step into the studio to test their music knowledge in hopes of becoming the Christmas PopMaster

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.sub-title: Night of the Nearly Dead Season 3, Episode 7
programme.desc: Mrs Doyle wins a competition to meet a famous singer, and discreetly invites him round for tea - but the secret slips out, and soon the house is besieged by hordes of adoring pensioners. Comedy, starring Dermot Morgan, Ardal O'Hanlon and Pauline McLynn

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ian Steadman and Maria Callaghan want to buy their first property together in Estepona, their favourite location on Spain's Costa del Sol. Jasmine Harman searches every nook and cranny of the local market seeking a suitable property for £150,000 or less

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A glampsite owner in Italy battles a busy summer season with no staff. In France, a family from Manchester face challenges as they juggle their family life and holiday home

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.sub-title: Food Unwrapped Does Christmas 2018 Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: With less than a week to go before millions of hungry people tuck into their Christmas dinners, the team reveal various surprises behind festive food. Jimmy Doherty heads to Sri Lanka to find out if there is anything in yuletide spices that can give a person a dose of Christmas cheer. Matt Tebbutt visits a mince pie factory to learn the difference between raisins and currants. Helen Lawal investigates how well sprouts should be cleaned and Kate Quilton checks out a more decadent festive roast from the past

programme.title: Matt Baker: Travels with Mum & Dad
programme.desc: Part one of two. Matt takes his parents on two very special Christmas trips. On their first outing, the Bakers head to Edinburgh with a very special regal invite to board the Royal Yacht Britannia. Matt and mum Janice lend a hand in the State Dining Room as they help out with place setting to royal precision, while dad Mike gets a behind-the-scenes tour of the ship's spotless engine room in the company of one of the 'Royal Yachtsmen'. Matt then helps the maintenance crew re-paint Britannia's gold leaf-striped hull . Later, the trio host the ultimate Christmas party on board the vessel

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Alarm-company owner Bill Black kicks off a series of dinner parties in Dundee, where he hopes his belt-busting menu will impress his guests - proud Arbroathian Phil Petrie, English student Hannah Wilson, ferret fancier Alex Pithouse and 28-year-old Kim Gillespie - and make him an early contender for the £1,000 prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Architectural technician Alex Pithouse hosts the second dinner party in Dundee, and aims to impress his guests by giving them an education in fine dining, complete with a complex menu and some good wines, as well as by introducing them to his three pet ferrets

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Vegetarian Hannah Wilson prepares an Italian feast for her guests in Dundee, and in a bid to win over her carnivore guests she devises a cunning plan that involves dishing up some meat with the starter

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The fourth night in Dundee is hosted by self-styled food critic Phil Petrie, who has been unimpressed with the culinary standard so far. He hopes to impress with his evening, but things begin to go wrong when he runs out of ingredients and leaves his guests feeling hungry

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the final night in Dundee, Kim Gillespie plans an ambitious menu, largely based on Yorkshire delights, with exotic dishes from Spain and Thailand also featuring - all accompanied by a Scottish choir singing American songs

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Claire Hilton, who runs Robertsbrook Guest House in Swanage, Dorset, feels she has a good chance of winning the title of best B&B as another round of the competition gets under way. However, guests Lynn Self and Ziggy Broome have doubts over the cleanliness of their bedroom, and another couple are accustomed to more opulent surroundings

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Lynn Self and Ziggy Broome hope to impress with their two-star B&B Eden Lodge in Falmouth, Cornwall. However, the state of their property disappoints their fellow competitors. At dinner, James and Maria Church reveal the truth about their famous daughter Charlotte, and the following morning's breakfast reduces some of the guests to fits of giggles

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: It is the turn of Charlotte Church's parents James and Maria to play host at Dexby Townhouse in Cardiff, and they pull out all the stops by laying on a day of white-water rafting and a magic performance courtesy of their nephew Elliot. But the following morning, some of the guests are kept waiting for breakfast

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.sub-title: Muddifords Court Country House Season 2011, Episode 4
programme.desc: Newlyweds Pip Easby and Nicky Lesser-Easby, who run Muddifords Court Country House in Devon, open their doors for the final stay of the competition. The Churches find their four-poster bed too small, and not all the guests enjoy their trip to a local glass-blowing factory, but feedback at check-out time leaves the hosts feeling confident

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers and to air their grievances. An underpayment from a surprising source changes the dynamics of the group and throws the competition wide open, before the winner is announced

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Ptol Slattery hosts the first dinner party in Winchester, Hampshire, but his menu of seared scallops, lamb steak with baby new potatoes followed by chocolate mousse leaves his guests - waitress Patrician Pearson, DJ Francis Leigh, care-home worker Georgia Groves and estate agent William Tilsley - underwhelmed

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: DJ Francis Leigh hosts the next dinner party in Winchester, hoping to dazzle his guests with his sunburnt chicken curry, a Thai meal with a twist and a dessert simply called 'sticky.' The entertainment for the night proves to be weird and wonderful as he dons a tutu and fur coat to serve the main course

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Waitress Patricia Pearson hosts the next party in Winchester, but the decision to write her menu in Spanish causes confusion for one guest who mistakes lamb for llama. The Peruvian-themed feast is followed by a rendition of the country's national anthem and a traditional dance involving a candle and a donkey's jaw

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the fourth night of the competition in Winchester, Georgia Groves plans a black-tie evening complete with a red carpet, posh frocks and a spray-tan booth. It appears to be going well until Patricia Pearson reveals what she thinks of Ptol Slattery and his wine antics

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Estate agent William Tilsley throws one last dinner party as a week of competitions in Winchester, Hampshire, draws to a close. The host plans to offer his guests a vegetarian menu, with a blind food-tasting game providing the evening's entertainment. As the night draws to a close, one of the competitors rises above the rest to become the winner

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Gary, 50, is brought into St George's hospital by ambulance after a garage collapsed and fell on his legs. His wife Peta joins him, while Maggie, 83, comes in to A&E with suspected sepsis. She's joined by her son and daughter, who also deal with the fact their mother has lung cancer. Plus, cameras follow one-year-old George, who is rushed in with his mother after drinking nail varnish remover

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Thirty-one-year-old Alison is brought in after being kicked with such force by a horse that her leg was broken, while 12-year-old cyclist Harry is also treated for leg injuries, after being involved in a 10-bike pile-up at a velodrome. The staff at St George's also have to deal with 48-year-old Tony, who was riding pillion with his father when their motorbike was involved in a crash, leaving them both badly injured, with Tony having to be flown in to the hospital by emergency helicopter

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: A freak car accident in Cumbria leaves Richard fighting for his life. In Hampshire, horse rider Pat takes a nasty fall when her animal is spooked. Plus, in a night mission in Suffolk, the medics race to the aid of motorcyclist Nigel who has suffered serious multiple injuries

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Incidents involving the West Midlands Ambulance Service at night, including a fight in a fast food restaurant, and a woman who has fallen while carrying her four-month-old grandson

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Gary, 50, is brought into St George's hospital by ambulance after a garage collapsed and fell on his legs.
